titles.title: TRAIN Act
TRAIN Act
Training, Retention, And Investment Now for a Better America Act

To amend the Workforce Innovation Opportunity Act to codify a competitive grant program to build community colleges' capacity to provide employment and training programs for in-demand industries or occupations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Training, Retention, And Investment Now for a Better America Act or the TRAIN Act
This bill provides statutory authority for the Department of Labor's Strengthening Community Colleges Training Grants program, which awards competitive grants for community colleges to provide education or career training for jobs in high-demand industries.
